problem.markdown:
1. The tap changing control equipment includes _______
() Automatic voltage regulating relay () Control and paralleling equipment () Line drop compensator equipment used along with the current transformer to provide voltage control at a point remote from the measuring point (x) All
2. Conservator is an oil-expansion tank mounted _________ on the transformer.
() Ground level () Below the highest oil point (x) Above the highest oil point () Any of the them
3. Advantage of using instrument Transformer is _______
() None () Standard rated instruments may be used easily (x) Standard rated instruments may be used easily and It provides safety for operating personal () It provides safety for operating personal
4. In a transformer, if N2 is number of secondary winding N1 is the number of primary winding then, if (N2/N1) ratio is lesser than 1.It is called as ________
() All (x) Step down transformer () Step up transformer () Isolation transformer
5. In a transformer, if N2 is number of secondary winding N1 is the number of primary winding then, if (N2/N1) ratio is greater than 1.It is called as ________
() All (x) Step up transformer () Step down transformer () Isolation transformer
problem.p: 1. The tap changing control equipment includes _______

choicegroup.choice: Line drop compensator equipment used along with the current transformer to provide voltage control at a point remote from the measuring point

problem.p: 2. Conservator is an oil-expansion tank mounted _________ on the transformer.
3. Advantage of using instrument Transformer is _______

choicegroup.choice: Standard rated instruments may be used easily
Standard rated instruments may be used easily and It provides safety for operating personal
It provides safety for operating personal

problem.p: 4. In a transformer, if N2 is number of secondary winding N1 is the number of primary winding then, if (N2/N1) ratio is lesser than 1.It is called as ________
5. In a transformer, if N2 is number of secondary winding N1 is the number of primary winding then, if (N2/N1) ratio is greater than 1.It is called as ________
